imdb.title: Ben-To
imdb.plot: Sato Yo is an ordinary high school boy who likes playing games on his SEGA console. One day when he decided to buy bento for dinner at the local grocery store, he suddenly lost consciousness. When he finally came to, he had no mem...

episodes.title: Stick with It, Natto Okra Rice Bowl with Chinese Topping Bento - 440kcal
episodes.plot: Feeding yourself isn't easy, on a fixed budget in boarding school. Yo Sato learns it's even harder when brawls break out every night at local supermarkets, the moment bento meals go on sale. The only way to get a bento is to fight the wolves for one.

episodes.title: Mackerel Boiled in Miso Bento 674kcal
episodes.plot: Yo and Hana join the Half-Pricers Club. Its leader, Sen, teaches them the ropes, then sends them out into the wild to fend for themselves. There's a lot to learn, but it looks like Yo might turn out to be a successful wolf after all.

episodes.title: Large Serving of Cheese-Filled Cutlet Curry 1080kcal
episodes.plot: The kendo club at school has their own ideas about how to acquire half-price bentos, and its captain makes a tempting offer to entice Yo into their fold. The time has come for Yo to ask himself what his motivation is for being a wolf.

episodes.title: Ginger Fried Pork Bento 852kcal
episodes.plot: It's nothing but trouble when Yo's half-Italian cousin Ayame shows up and starts causing problems. Meanwhile, some shadowy organization appears to be gathering information about the local wolves.

episodes.title: Fish Soup with Hokkaido Salmon 326kcal
episodes.plot: Yo inadvertently finds himself caught up in a brewing turf war between wolves from the east and west sides of town. Wolves generally do their own thing, but this time they might need to work together to defend what belongs to them.

episodes.title: Special Japanese Fried Chicken Bento 795kcal
episodes.plot: The Monarch, leader of the eastern wolves, claims he wants to take over the supermarkets in the west as well. Sen comes up with a plan to foil him, while Ayame learns there might be more going on here than meets the eye.

episodes.title: Bosomelet Bento 752kcal and Loco Moco Bulging Bento 1100kcal
episodes.plot: The Half-Pricers Club gets free tickets to a Hawaii-themed water park, so it's excursion time! While there, Yo learns that supermarkets aren't the only places where bento brawls occur.

episodes.title: Jumbo Garlic Chive Hamburger Steak Bento 765kcal
episodes.plot: An unfortunate mishap lands Yo in the hospital. Twin sisters Kyo and Kyo, student council officers from Ayame's school, are trying to learn more about Sen. When they mistake Yo, covered in bandages, for Sen, a comedy of errors ensues.

episodes.title: Deluxe Western and Japanese Food Assortment 2910kcal and Piping Hot Porridge Bento 340kcal
episodes.plot: Homemade bentos are the order of the day, but sometimes these can prove just as dangerous as bentos won in battle. Asebi believes Yo is a big fan of her cooking, while Ume decides to take things up a notch with Hana.

episodes.title: It Was a Warm Gentle Flavor That Reminded Me of My Grandmother. A Japanese Dish That Was Kind to Both Body and Soul. Plum and Dried Baby Sardines Over Rice with Plenty of Seasonal Vegetables Stewed Bento 480kcal
episodes.plot: There's a new wolf duo in town, and they go by the name Orthros. This pair seems to be as unbeatable as they are mysterious, but the real surprise comes when it's revealed that their true identities aren't so shrouded in mystery after all.

episodes.title: Pocari Sweat 125kcal
episodes.plot: A certain supermarket puts fresh eel bentos on sale one day each summer, and this is sure to attract plenty of wolves. But to make it there, first Sen will have to recover from a cold, and Orthros will have to overcome the specter of their painful past.

episodes.title: Domestic Eel Bento 790kcal
episodes.plot: The old nemesis of Orthros shows up in town to undermine them once again. With Sen still sick with a cold, it will be up to Yo to figure out a way to rebalance the playing field for all the wolves, as they vie for seasonal eel bentos.
